data.title: Expreso de la Robla, a trip to the Camino de Santiago
data.meta_description: Comfort, gastronomy and a high quality service are the keys to Expreso de la Robla. Enjoy the culture of the Camino de Santiago French Way
data.text:
Expreso La Robla Train

The Expreso de la Robla promises a luxury journey through the North of Spain, preserving the charm of classic rail travel. During 3 days and 2 nights you will meander through a green paradise, with a careful itinerary designed to visit cities such as Bilbao and León

The TrainBooking

The La Robla Express Train offers two possible routes, to choose between Bilbao and León, or vice versa, between León and Bilbao, visiting emblematic places of the Castilla Leon region. A perfect occasion to enjoy a wonderful trip aboard a luxury train, with very affordable prices.

The Deluxe Suites of the Transcantábrico Train are spacious, first class rooms that combine the elegance of the past century with all the modern comforts. They have a private bathroom with hydromassage, WIFI and 24-hour room service.

Travel to medieval times by strolling through the town of Santillana del Mar and admire the modernity of Bilbao at the Guggenheim Museum. Enter the traditions and legends of the sacred Sanctuary of Covadonga. From Santiago de Compostela to San Sebastián, amazing places await you to show you the best of Northern Spain.

This is a journey through the exquisite gastronomy of regions such as Galicia, Asturias, Cantabria and the Basque Country. Its best specialties will not be missed on the table, accompanied by local wines from the wine denominations of origin from the north of the Iberian Peninsula.

“Both for the places visited and for the experience of traveling on a train with all the comforts.”

Aurelia

“The service was luxurious at all times. The food with a very careful and delicious dishes. And the cozy rooms.”

Rebeca
